content.question: Holly asks her brother to turn up the music he is playing so she can hear it better. He turns it up one level, and Holly asks him why he didn't turn it up like she asked. Which of the following concepts explains why Holly did not think her brother turned up the music?

choices.label: The volume was below her absolute threshold.
Perception was not activated by the music.
The volume had not yet reached the just-noticeable difference threshold.
The music was a subliminal stimulus.

content.answer: The volume had not yet reached the just-noticeable difference threshold.

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
